title: Gun seized from Montgomery County woman’s carry-on at airport, TSA says
text:
A woman from Montgomery County, Md., was found last week with a loaded revolver in her carry-on bag at Baltimore-Washington International Marshall Airport, authorities said.

The Transportation Security Administration said it was the 23rd gun detected so far this year at BWI, surpassing the 22 guns detected all of last year.

In this latest case, the woman said she forgot that she had the gun with her, TSA said Monday.

The gun was spotted Friday while inside an X-ray machine at a checkpoint, TSA said. They said Maryland Transportation Authority police confiscated the gun and arrested the woman on weapons charges.

description: The revolver was the 23rd gun found this year at BWI airport, agency says.
